name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series where Harry discovers his wizarding heritage.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry returns to Hogwarts and unravels the mystery of the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry learns about Sirius Black and discovers the truth about his parents' betrayal.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament and faces Voldemort's return.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry faces challenges from the Ministry of Magic while preparing for Voldemort's return.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry discovers more about Voldemort's past and prepares for the ultimate battle.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry and his friends embark on a journey to defeat Voldemort and bring peace to the wizarding world.

name: 400 Days
author: Chetan Bhagat
description: A gripping tale of a mother searching for her missing daughter, with unexpected twists and turns.

name: Half Girlfriend
author: Chetan Bhagat
description: A gripping tale of a mother searching for her missing daughter, with unexpected twists and turns.

name: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A young shepherd's journey to discover the treasure he dreams of, learning life's lessons along the way.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A timeless novel of growing up and the moral awakening in the racially charged American South.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling depiction of a totalitarian regime and a society under constant surveillance.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his unrelenting love for Daisy Buchanan.

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A witty exploration of manners, morality, and love in early 19th-century England.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A tale of teenage angst and alienation told through the eyes of Holden Caulfield.

name: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The journey of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, as he embarks on a grand adventure to win a share of a treasure guarded by a dragon.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: An exploration of the history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern age.

name: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

name: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The former First Lady of the United States shares her story, from her childhood in Chicago to her years in the White House.

name: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
author: Rebecca Skloot
description: The story of Henrietta Lacks, whose cells were taken without her knowledge and became one of the most important tools in medicine.

name: The Wright Brothers
author: David McCullough
description: A biography of Wilbur and Orville Wright, the brothers who invented the first successful airplane.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: A groundbreaking tour of the mind, explaining the two systems that drive the way we think.

name: The Body Keeps the Score
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: A pioneering researcher transforms our understanding of trauma and its impact on the body and mind.

name: The Power of Habit
author: Charles Duhigg
description: An exploration of the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed.

name: Quiet
author: Susan Cain
description: A look at the strengths of introverts and how they can thrive in a world that often values extroversion.

name: The Body Keeps the Score
author: Bessel van der Kolk
description: A pioneering researcher transforms our understanding of trauma and its impact on the body and mind.

name: The Power of Habit
author: Charles Duhigg
description: An exploration of the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed.
